name: Community Options for Residential and Employment Services, INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Community Options for Residential and Employment Services, INC is a Counselor provider based in Bismarck, ND. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $84.4M in Medicaid payments across 262K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $84.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
